website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive product proves reliable in comfort and style despite its surprising affordability.
pros: Adorable design comes in a  variety of color and sizing options
cons: A little too thin to use as a crate cushion
Company does not offer an extra large size

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Cute, and Kitties Love It.
customer_reviews.text: I gifted this to my daughter's Tuxedo Cat, thinking it would satisfy his love of soft blankies and provide nice background to show him off in pictures. However, his Stripey brother has taken it over, smiling as he stretches out on it, sound asleep (photos). Very soft on both sides, polyester for easy washing and lightweight enough that it will dry quickly. The design is very cute on the grey background., and I'll probably be buying another so all the boys can enjoy their own blankie.
customer_reviews.author: Linnie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my husky!
customer_reviews.text: Super duper soft blanket. One of the only colors dogs can see is a blue and a tan color, so I got the blue version for my husky. She absolutely loves it. It's a thinner blanket so it's not too warm for her thick coat either :) It's the perfect size for her to snuggle with. She sleeps with it on top of her, and drags it around the house wherever she goes. Edit: For anyone wondering I got the large size.
customer_reviews.author: Miso

customer_reviews.title: My dog loved this blanket right out of the package!
customer_reviews.text: My little dog was sleeping in it within 30 minutes of delivery!! It's a small large if you know what I mean but it's cool. Soft on both sides and nice colored little textured spots that my Che dog loved off the bat. I came into the room after spreading it out and he had caved himself up in the blanket. Perfect for my 7 1/2 pound little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Trish

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and a good size for a cat carrier. Kitten likes it everyday and in every way!
customer_reviews.author: RML

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my cat
customer_reviews.text: I got the small blanket. It's pretty small, but I knew that going in. It's a perfect size for my cat. It's super soft and he loves it. I use it in his carrier to comfort him when we have to take him somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jamin VanderBerg

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this blanket because it was part of their Christmas ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in pink and blue, one for each of my fur babies. I wanted to love this blanket because it was part of their Christmas gift. The size is great. The blankets left little fuzzies all over everything they touched. Pink and blue fuzzies everywhere, on their beds, in the washing machine, all over everything washed with the blankets. I re washed the other dog linens separately after spotting the fuzzies and they would not wash off. I ended up throwing these blankets away and still have fuzzies 2 months later :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty kitty blanket
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket, it's great for my kitty to lay on the bed, only gets hair in the blanket. I have a small one I thought would be great on her cat tower. She was quite put off with it on the tower and refused to sit on it there. It's pretty and soft on the bed she's a fan!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia B.

customer_reviews.title: Pet hair comes off of the blanket so easily with a couple shakes
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is so soft and cozy. My dog loves sleeping on it. Only draw back is that I wish they had bigger sizes. My dog is 85lbs, and the largest size still seemed kind of small. Pet hair comes off of the blanket so easily with a couple shakes, unlike other fleece blankets. Definitely worth it, the large one cost me $14 (shipping included).
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: THIN AND SMALL.
customer_reviews.text: Not worth $12. VERY thin and small. A common towel is MUCH thicker and about the same size. But if you own a rat or hamster, it would be fine to wrap them in.
customer_reviews.author: T. French

customer_reviews.title: Clover approved this blanket
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sweet little blanket. I'm not sure if it will wash well. My little rescue dog seems to like it. She's 10 lbs and the small size is just the right size for her to lay on or snuggle with. It's very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Stinky Special

customer_reviews.title: Fuzz everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Fuzz everywhere. Washed and dried this 4 or 5 times trying to get the fuzz off. Used lint rollers, everything. It just wouldn't stop shedding. This was the pink version. We have a blue one that we didn't have this problem with so either the manufacturer changed or the pink material isn't as good as the blue.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: THE CUTEST BLANKET EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: We brought our shelter doggie home on Saturday and this blanket was waiting on her new little bed. She dove under it, played with it, moved it around with her little paws. At one point, she was dragging it thru the house. It's a perfect size for her to snuggle in (I got the medium); she's 13 lbs. Take a look at the pic. She's in love, as we are with her.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Liebchen

customer_reviews.title: Soft 😸💕
customer_reviews.text: First off, this blanket is unbelievably soft. I got it for my two kittens and they love it. It's become they're favorite blanket! I would highly recommend folding it in half, length wise. I don't think this is a suitable blanket for a larger fur baby, as it is pretty thin, but for smaller animals it's perfect. ❤️😌 Will likely purchase another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Alvarez

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes this blanket!
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn’t typically lay with blankets outside of his kennel and he doesn’t play with them generally. He likes his squeaky toy and his stuffed elephant, but blankets haven’t really been his thing until this one. He loves it! Every morning he pulls it out of his kennel and plays with it and then when it’s time to go back in his kennel he brings it with him. It’s super cute! I’m not sure on the durability, I’ve i let had it a couple of days, but so far it’s a win.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me and My Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Yup does the job. Exactly what I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I hoped for it to be.....got this cause my lab loves to lay on couches and my bed and when she's good I need a blanket for her to lay on cause I don't want her to lay on my furniture without one. It's perfect size I thought it would be small but it's as described. By looking at it I think it should be washed but hung dry to avoid shrinkage. It's thin but for just using it to cover furniture or spot on bed it's perfect and really cute and soft. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dejavually

customer_reviews.title: love this blanket it is very cute
customer_reviews.text: love this blanket it is very cute, thin and light. I bought it to put in my dog's carrying bag and it is perfect for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Johanna I.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Puppy is always sleeping on this blanket. In fact she's sleeping on it right now!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket for puppy
customer_reviews.text: Our golden retriever puppy LOVES this blanket and it's super cute. We rubbed it on ourselves so it would smell like us, and she carries it around the house and will nap on it wherever she ends up. It has also held up very well - she likes to chew on it and pull it from the other side for solo tug-of-war, and the blanket doesn't show any signs of damage after a month of that. It is also thick enough that if I put the blanket in my lap she doesn't scratch me through it.
customer_reviews.author: SqueakyK

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Cheap was falling apart in package returned. Baby blankets are cheaper and can be washed without falling apart
customer_reviews.author: Mama-Phia

customer_reviews.title: Great blanket
customer_reviews.text: I like this blanket so much I want one for myself. It is very soft and much bigger than I pictured in my mind when purchasing. My dog likes it, it helps keep him warm on colder days. I may just order another one or two in the future. I would order from this seller again, the package arrived on time and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: WishfulNess

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: You cannot tell with the pictures they show you, but this blanket is made cheap,small, thin, and only one-sided. I'm still going to have to use it since I am past the return date. I would recommend saving yourself some money and going to Ross. I was able to find a double-sided luxury pet blanket for $7 and plenty of other name brand supplies for a lot less.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my fur baby Payton loves this, and it's sooo soft!
customer_reviews.author: EricaLynn

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice blanket for the price and it is soft, but it is rather thin and does not wash well. Washing well seems like it would be an important marker of a "dog blanket." I made the mistake of washing it with other things, and everything was completely covered in fuzz. I put this over my couch to try to keep dog hair from working itself into the tweedish fabric, and this did not help with that at all. I was initially happy with it because it's pretty and soft, but it's not very functional as a protective dog blanket.
customer_reviews.author: S. Diggs

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - COUGHING AND WHEEZING FROM TINY SHEDDING FIBERS
customer_reviews.text: Cute and soft, but a regrettable purchase of two of these throws — because they shed like crazy! Even after two washes and dries, the fuzzy fibers never stop shedding! The fibers simply do not hold. I’ve even tried lint rolling, and found that I could be lint rolling these forever. The fibers don’t stay. I have found the pink fuzz and fibers all over my clothing and in random parts of the home. The worst thing is the fine fibers fly everywhere, get inhaled, and have caused difficulties with breathing. Into the garbage these went!!!
customer_reviews.author: Platy

customer_reviews.title: Problem solved!
customer_reviews.text: When I adopted my rescue, I didn't have much time to shop for bed, grooming items, etc. I bought this bed because it was on sale and the right size. She loves it, but since then I've purchased a memory foam bed that fits perfectly in her crate. Because she loves this ugly thing too, I wanted to keep it for her naps, so I bought this cute blanket to cover it. Problem solved! As you can see, the softness makes it very comfy, and best of all, I don't have to see the ugliness from the living room. Love the black trim too.
customer_reviews.author: Cruz

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am not a review person, but this one deserves it for all the puppy parents out there also looking for quality products :) Thank you for a great quality product for my Kirby Ace aka Chew Monster :) he is 10 mth lab/hound, and loves his new blanket! Played with it, ran with it, around the house for a good while:) and falls asleep with it the almost immediately most nights:) Seems to have a soothing effect. And that its is in colors dogs can see is an added bonus. Def a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: LadyPhoenix

customer_reviews.title: Better off buying a regular human blanket
customer_reviews.text: I’m not really impressed with this pet blanket at all. I bought it since it had good reviews and i needed one but the quality just isn’t there at all. Its so thin you can see the dots from the other side. And the dots are kinda rough and so is the boareder, even though the rest of the blanket is soft. I get that the border is like that since it’s supposed to be chew resistant, which it definitely is not. My dog got his nail stuck in the boarder the 2nd day I gave it to him and it ripped instantly. I then washed it and it basically unwravled in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: Melrel05

customer_reviews.title: rips easily
customer_reviews.text: If you have a dog that likes to make her "nest" before laying down, this blanket is not for you. I love the material. I love how it does not attract the dog hair. I love the pattern and colors, however, using this for ONE full day and finding numerous tears is something I do not love.
customer_reviews.author: avid reader

customer_reviews.title: overall just a tiny crappy cheaply made blanket
customer_reviews.text: Returned because it was not what I expected - too small, too thin, no protective bottom later, overall just a tiny crappy cheaply made blanket. My dog would probably have destroyed it in 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Bell

customer_reviews.title: Love them.
customer_reviews.text: my dogs love these silly blankets. they drag them around the house to lay on wherever they go. they are sturdy and soft. I can put them in their carrier for a bit of cush when we are on the go, or take them to the kennel for a familiar object to have onhand until we return. they wash great and are cute and colorful.
customer_reviews.author: caeden

customer_reviews.title: Best quality dog blanket I’ve ever seen. Great price too & beautiful colors!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful soft, cuddly dog blanket. Hadn’t shrunk after wash & drying. Beautiful colors! Comes in blue ( which I bought) or pink! I use this to cover my French bulldog at nighttime but we have also used it for our bernedoodle too which is a large dog! I’m going to purchase a pink one for our pug because it is the best dog blanket I have ever come across! I highly recommend this blanket for your dog, you won’t be disappointed & neither will your pup!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Peraza

customer_reviews.title: It's his new favorite toy/friend. The blanket itself is very soft and ...
customer_reviews.text: My kitten absolutely loves this blanket! He sleeps with it and plays with it. It's his new favorite toy/friend. The blanket itself is very soft and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super durable and snuggly!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 14 week old Golden Retriever puppy, and I bought this blanket and the matching bed about a week before I picked her up (she was 6 weeks old, for reference!). This blanket has held up to her craziness amazingly well!! It’s been washed a ton and it still looks brand new.
customer_reviews.author: JoJo

customer_reviews.title: Keep Looking
customer_reviews.text: Not very big or think. My dogs use them as a pillow and a tug toy. They ripped it in a matter of minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small & Soft; Will work through  the fall months
customer_reviews.text: This is soft, very small, but it’s for a crate, so small works for my dachshund. I only give this 4 stars because I thought it was going to be thicker. For this size/width, I could’ve purchased something similar at TJ Maxx or even Walmart for $2 to $3 dollars less. But hey, who wants to go window shopping for dog blankets during a Pandemic. Good blanket for fall weather or comfort; will search for a thicker blanket come winter.
customer_reviews.author: Casey B

customer_reviews.title: Ok quality - great price, though...
customer_reviews.text: This looks super cute - I ordered the large pink. It's a thinner blanket (good to have options for my fur-child when she's not as cold, but still wants to nest). Feels soft. Not bulky. BUT...it sheds like no tomorrow. Was shedding before I washed it. After first wash, left quite a few clumps of blanket shedding. Blanket still looks ok - just a lot of cleanup in my washer.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy’s Wallet

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My 8 week old miniature dachshund fell in love with this blanket immediately. The small was the perfect size for my pup. He had an accident on it so it's already been washed. It's still very soft but had a couple fuzz balls I had to pull off. Nevertheless, considering purchasing another color since he loves it so much. Update: My puppy has since chewed multiple holes in this blanket. He is a puppy so obviously in a chewing phase but I was not expecting him to be able to chew a hole into this blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Soft and light weight and easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: I rid of you because I own several of these in different colors but for some reason this pink one Trim came off of itthe first time I washed it a little disappointed with it . PS the other three colors I have held up quite well I know for sure him several times
customer_reviews.author: debbinwa

customer_reviews.title: Blanket sheds but soft
customer_reviews.text: Wheb i brought home my 3 month corgi i purchased this blanket for him and thought he was sheeding but it was the blanket alot of lint was left on my clothing... but my corgi sleeps with this blanket ever night it is very soft just sheds alot of lent
customer_reviews.author: janay

customer_reviews.title: Chihuahua loves to burrow under large size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on two separate occasions. The first one we still have and is in great shape after more than a year. We got largest size for our chihuahua mix as she likes to burrow. She uses it a lot, every day for most of the day. Easy to clean and is very soft. I only gave 4 stars because when we bought a 2nd one, it arrived with a rip at seem with edging so we returned the 2nd one right away. Based on the first one only, this is a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: vac

customer_reviews.title: Made for dogs, people love it too
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these blankets for family pet dogs. The larger of the two was highjacked by my sister to use as a lap blanket for herself. She and her dog now share it. Very soft and comfortable and attractive design as well. I love the edging around the blanket. The small one was good also, but small. I would not recommend it except for a toy dog or a cat. Otherwise, it was a very good choice for a pet Christmas gift! Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice and Soft but Slick Blanket
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is super soft and it's pretty. Just a heads up that it will slide around easily on leather type surfaces. We got this for the dog to get on our leather sofa and it does the job......but if the dog moves, so does the blanket very easily and is prone to sliding all around and off the couch. The dog loves the soft blanket and well use it for a pallet on the floor or for cushioning his crate. The blanket is absolutely perfect for that, just slick on the leather couch. Would definitely recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Joni Craft

customer_reviews.title: Hope it will last
customer_reviews.text: Great blanket, my puppy loved it as soon as it came it and started sleeping on it as soon as I laid it in her crate. Great alternative because she tears up every bed we've given her in her crate. I hope that it will last to when she's at least a year old.
customer_reviews.author: Marco M.

customer_reviews.title: Soft, Snuggly, and All the Polka Dots
customer_reviews.text: My girls got these blankets as an early Christmas present this year (in addition to toys, so don’t think I jipped them). These blankets are so soft and snuggly, my dogs use them every single day. Of course my power chewer (pictured right) already put a hole in hers. But she loves her blanket so much that she hasn’t shredded this one like she’s done in the past with her others. They’re a thin material, so they won’t make your pets too hot or overheated. They love to snuggle with these ones in front of the woodstove when we’ve got a fire going. I mean, seriously, look how happy they are.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Dog blanket
customer_reviews.text: I had expected this blanket to be much thicker than it actually is, this is why I'm only giving 4 stars. But take this into consideration since this was my own preconceived notion. Besides that, the blanket seems to be made well: the border is sewn on to where I feel it will not fray easily. I have washed it and it came out of the dryer in one piece and no fading or bleeding of color. FYI - the design of the blanket was conceived in the USA, but it was actually made in China. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Should have read comments/reviews before buying
customer_reviews.text: Cute blanket with decent thickness for pets. Should have read further. Instructions for drying are to "line dry." Says nothing about this in description but emphasizes machine washable. Some say it is ok to dry while others said after washing feels like it is falling apart. If I'd have known this I would have bought something else. I don't want blankets that my dogs use to be a toss up when it comes to cleaning them on a regular basis. I need to know for sure I can dry them so I can clean and replace quickly. I'd give 3.5 stars but this is not an option.
customer_reviews.author: DoodleBugs

customer_reviews.title: so soft & great size
customer_reviews.text: My dog gets cold a lot & won't sit or lay on an uncarpeted floor. This is great to drape over him while we're on the couch & I plan on taking it when we go out to eat so he'll sit & lay on the concrete floor. It's very soft but kind of thin, which is ok because it will be easy to put in my bag when we go out. I can't say how it washes or how durable it is. It's a very cute print with the polka dots.
customer_reviews.author: Matilda

customer_reviews.title: My Dog LOVES this blanket!
customer_reviews.text: First time we've had a dog in our family! She is just like a kid! She needs a soft, fluffy blanket! It reminds me of my children's wanting their special blankies when they were young! The material is soft and fluffy! Washes and dries beautifully! Luna (our puppies name) absolutely loves her new blanket! Great service and quick shipping! Thank you! ; )
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Nice place for an old cat to sleep
customer_reviews.text: I have an old cat that I have to keep confined much of the time. She can't regulate her body heat very well anymore. We had a pet bed for her, and then realized it was too bulky, and she was overheating in it. This blanket is soft, so she likes to lie on it. But it's light enough that if she's overheating, she can move it out of the way and lie on the floor. I got a medium. Folded in half, it makes a very soft bed. I'm very happy with this purchase. I feel that it's making her last days a lot more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: VLD

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I really just wanted a blanket to throw over my dog's bed. I wanted to be able to wash the blanket rather than the bed cover. However, I didn't want any obnoxious dog prints or anything that screamed "dog" on the blanket. I wanted it to be cute but still blend in with my decor. This blanket does just that. It's so soft and cute while still being sublte. Even if it's not thrown over her bed my scottish terrier seeks this blanket out to lay on it. It's the perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Mccoy

customer_reviews.title: Very thin, has already started to fall apart
customer_reviews.text: Cute, soft, and thin. To me, not worth the money. All the wonderful reviews makes me wonder if people write a review before really using the product and washing it. It’s already come apart at the seams and is even thinner than it was when I got it. If you’re using it for your dog, I presume you’re washing it frequently and it’s just not going to last long. As cheap as the price was, I’d still say not worth it. If you need blankets, which I always do, I recommend the clearance section at target. You can get kids ones for 5-10 dollars that are much thicker and better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Crayne

customer_reviews.title: Very soft blanket for very small dogs
customer_reviews.text: I got this blanket for my dog because he likes to wrap himself in and under blankets, but always ends up dragging bigger blankets across the house! So I got him this very small blanket (he is 13 pounds). He cannot wrap himself up as usual, but good enough to cover himself when in my office. I was impressed by the softness of this blanket!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Collin

customer_reviews.title: The material it's really good! But I ordered size S because I have ...
customer_reviews.text: The blanket it's very soft! The material it's really good! But I ordered size S because I have a chihuahua and I thinks it's too small. I should have bought medium. It's because my chihuahua loves to snuggle and I think she prefers big blankets.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra

customer_reviews.title: Great travel pet blankie
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs each have a little blankie (ordered small size for 12 lb little fluffs) and they love them for snuggling! The small size is perfect, we use for extra comfort with a bed in the kennel & in our soft-sided airline travel carrier. Both have held up great in the wash, I even washed regular cycle with towels and such, still soft. They don’t shed & have not pilled. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Nice blanket - Ugly edging/border.
customer_reviews.text: The blanket is very soft which is great. The soft pink color along with the colored dots look like confetti. The drawback is that the edge of the blanket has a very poorly made edging that of all colors is solid black. You have a beautiful, pastel colored blanket with this horrible black edge that looks terrible. The edging should compliment the colors ih the blanket and not be some left over scraps of material.
customer_reviews.author: THRIFTYMOM

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap received it tried to return it and the hassle was so great that it was not worth the effort.. Normally never an issue with Amazon but this was such a hassle... Garbage
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jernigan

customer_reviews.title: Soft blanket.
customer_reviews.text: Nice soft dog blanket. Got one in blue and one in pink. Usually leave them in our dog's crates and they seem to like laying on them... and sometimes pulling them around or playing tug-of-war with them. Sturdy enough, though our puppies have managed to put a couple tears in them with their razor-sharp piranha teeth.
customer_reviews.author: KunkohTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: I got this in the hopes that my dog wouldn't chew it up like the 5 previous dog beds I've bought and had to throw away in the past... And so far, i think she's much happier with this, since she can ball it up or fluff it up and adjust it as much or as little as she wants, and it's survived for several weeks now! I'm shocked! But also very, very happy that I haven't needed to buy another expensive dog bed since purchasing this. Definitely would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Tosh

customer_reviews.title: Was ok
customer_reviews.text: This was ok. The picture makes it look more fluffy and soft. I didn't post a picture because my dog destroyed it. I bought this instead of a padded mattress for the dog kennel because my dog is a chewer. So I am still searching for something that is better for dogs who chew. My dog did love the blanket though, dragged it around. But the quality is more of the blankets you get for $2.50 at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Terri M

customer_reviews.title: The small size is pretty small and would be perfect for a tiny dog
customer_reviews.text: I bought this twice. The small size is pretty small and would be perfect for a tiny dog. My pup loves it but soon will grow out of it. I bought a large size as well and it is perfect for the bigger pup when I put her in her crate. It’s super soft and cozy. The black Border makes it feel more sturdy. The gray color with multicolor dots looks cute and classy. Wish there was a human size one - I’d use it for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Goodol10

customer_reviews.title: Cleans easily
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for new puppy who isn't completely potty trained. My pup had an accident on blanket and the urine didn't seep through immediately, so I was able to clean up urine easily. The fabric dries super fast. Manufacturer suggest wash and hang dry. All I know is I am buying a few more of these blankets to put in the dog crates for traveling to kinder-puppy classes and vet. I recommend this product because they are easily cleaned, super soft, and my three pups love them.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Cute but no match for juvenile Corso
customer_reviews.text: This blanket is cute and pretty soft. I loved it, and so did my 8 month old Corso nephew pup. He began ripping it seconds after receiving it. He's pretty destructive so there's no surprise there...and at his size, this blanket doesn't stand a chance. It's good for non-chewers and gentler dogs...but not a robust corso.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect blanket for my fur baby!
customer_reviews.text: I love the color of the blanket as it goes well with my gray sectional. The medium size is perfect and is exactly what I wanted for my little chihuahua. It’s soft and thin which I like as it seem like it wouldn’t make him too hot or too cold. I did think the color was going to be a bit darker but I still like. I did have a good laugh when I opened it up as it reminds me of a baby blanket for an actual newborn human baby. I would definitely recommend and I might consider ordering another on possibly on a different color too!
customer_reviews.author: tdemas

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Our dog really likes these blankets (we purchased 2). He will drag it around the house to lay on it wherever he may be. The matetial is soft and washes well. I am suprised it does not hold onto his smell like other blankets. In the past, we had to frequently wash his bedding due to how much "dog smell" it retained. These blankets don't do this at all. Its a breathable, lightweight material. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Angelique D

customer_reviews.title: Read the Negative Reviews! I didn't!
customer_reviews.text: The picture makes them look MUCH thicker than they really are! If you are going for warmth this isn't for your fur-baby! In addition, they are line dry! And I should have measured the size because the Medium sure is small! I haven't even washed it yet so I can't attest to how well it will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Diane M.

customer_reviews.title: Best dog blankey
customer_reviews.text: My dog his completely obsessed with this blanket. He uses it to suck on every morning for thing and he also does this again in the evening right before falling asleep at night. He drags it with him around the house and just holds on as it seems to be extremely comforting for him. This is the one item I will never travel without. He uses it so much I replace this item frequently!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Ver soft and bright colors
customer_reviews.text: This is great doggy blanket. Very soft and perfect size for my Ridgeback. However as much as I love this blanket my dog managed to destroy it really fast. This was blanket number two that got ripped apart just in a week. I think it is great blanket but definitely not for Rhodesian ridgeback !
customer_reviews.author: Varley

customer_reviews.title: Cute and soft, but not durable.
customer_reviews.text: This was literally brought into my house and given to my dogs 3 hours ago. Yes, I have a 1 year old pup who we just rescued who likes to chew, but MAN, it's at least taken a few days for her to do this type of damage to other blankets. It's cute, it's soft, it's probably easy to clean, but it is NOT durable. 😢
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Kitty blanket
customer_reviews.text: My cat loyally sleeps at the foot of my bed. And I was tired of her only laying on my good fleece throw so I got this. The funny part is that l had to entice her to use it. But one I turned it inside out she payed on it no problem. I guess the pattern or the texture on the inside is to her liking. Whatever the case she has been napping on her new blanket so l am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: BrownShopaholic$

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the good reviews on this blanket, I had high hopes. It’s not very soft, but my dog doesn’t really care about that all too much. It washes ok (starting to pill and fray a little). The edges are lined with trim but they’re starting to pull back. Honestly, just buy a cheap throw blanket at the store it’ll hold up better for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica E

customer_reviews.title: Not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to switch our guinea pig to a blanket instead of shavings or paper bedding because she is always kicking bedding out of her cage and making a mess. I didn't like this blanket because the pee would just sit on the top and she would end up walking in it. Didn't seem clean enough for me. Cute blanket though.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Kamstra

customer_reviews.title: Doggy Approved! 🐾
customer_reviews.text: If our little guy could talk, I just know he’d say “thanks Mom & Dad”! ;) This blanket is soooooo soft that it makes me want one just for me! It’s a nice size and would be perfect for placing on a sofa or chair to protect it from doggy paws while letting your furry friend be comfortable. I chose the grey which is adorable with the colorful polka dots. The stitching is perfect and the material appears durable. I think I may just have to order another!
customer_reviews.author: Florida GalTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Not tough enough
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog dog and I needed a blanket that can withstand pet use. I don't feel the the thinness is cost effective. I could have gone to the fabric store and bought a yard and a half of fabric. Pet blankets need to be wither twice as thick off your using fabric like this or multiple layers. We'll use this as a throw on top of a dog blanket if need be, but it was a waster of a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R.E

customer_reviews.title: My cat doesn't like it
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would be a nice soft surface for my cat to rest on. Well, she doesn't like it at all. She avoids it. It is soft and I like it, but the cat doesn't. So, right now I'm using it as a "barrier" to block off things I don't want her to access and it is working well for that.
customer_reviews.author: N. Little

customer_reviews.title: When the cats are happy, mom is happy!
customer_reviews.text: I have two 13 year old tabbies so I ordered 2 blankets. Pink for my girl and blue for my boy. I ordered the largest size because I wanted to fold the blankets into cushiony pallets for each of them. They are both cozy and happy. I haven't washed the blankets yet so I can't attest to their durability yet. For now, the kitties are warm and happily snoring on their new blankets and I no longer have to share my my own! Great buy at the daily deal price too!
customer_reviews.author: Violet Vixen

customer_reviews.title: Love this blanky!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice blanket. It is super soft. It doesn't fall apart when it is washed. I suggest washing it before using it because it did have some fuzzies coming off of it when I got it. After washing, there are no more fuzzies anywhere. It is not too heavy so if you have a dog that gets hot easily, this would be perfect. My rottie loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Puppy’s favorite blanket
customer_reviews.text: Bought this blanket, along with another one for our puppy. Purchased beforehand and sent to Breeder. Puppy had two blankets with mother and siblings scent. Great decision! I wash, then hang dry. Very soft, great size. Use in bed, crate, carrier, stroller, and play pen. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne

customer_reviews.title: No shedding or pilling!
customer_reviews.text: We love this so much we have 4 of them- one in each room! The blanket in the picture is A size Large. Our Chihuahua loves the larger blanket size to burrow in, but we also have the Small for when she's sitting on our laps! Great for inside her kennel too! The Grey color is not a true grey, but more of a grey/tan, which I love, but you should know that when purchasing. I've washed them regularly, they wash beautifully and hold up great! No shedding/pilling!
customer_reviews.author: DeAnn

customer_reviews.title: Defective?
customer_reviews.text: I liked this blanket when I received it even though I noticed it's a little thin for a dog blanket. However it tore after the first washing. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Collier

customer_reviews.title: Like it But Not Supposed to Dry in Dryer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to put inside dog bed. It is very soft and my dogs can bunch it up the way they like it. I like it because it keeps the dog bed cleaner longer. The one thing I don't like is that the washing instructions say not to put it in the dryer -- must hang dry. Really? I don't know why, but just in case drying it in the clothes dryer shortens the life of the blanket, I will be hanging it to dry like the instructions say.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Cute blanket. Didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: With in a few hours of giving this to my dog, he has torn the trimming off about 2” long. I ask to return it and cancel my subscription for a new one every 6 months. Just got s notice my replacement blanket will be here tomorrow. I guess I give this one another try.
customer_reviews.author: S Cummings

customer_reviews.title: King Louis loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I opened this and put it on the couch and King Louis promptly jumped and laid on it! He seems to love it and it’s a small size so he doesn’t have to share with mommy. It’s super cute and very soft but lightweight. Seems like the perfect companion for when we travel!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Nice but thin
customer_reviews.text: I bought these initially to put on the ground in my dog's pen when we are camping. After seeing how thin they were, I decided instead to put them in their kennels when we are camping. They just aren't thick enough to have them laying on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: dollfacedbaby1

customer_reviews.title: They were horrible!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these blankets for a litter of puppies. I was going to swap them out & use one while I washed the other. They were horrible!!! Lint everywhere! I washed one once & threw them both away! They made a huge mess!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch the size
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my dog hoping to get him to stop snuggling with my blanket. Although I can't say that the size was not advertise, I ordered the 36 inch one and it is way too small. By the time the dog bunches it up some, there is none to lay on. So keep the size in mind when you order. The fabric is great...it's soft and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: So soft and super cute blankie
customer_reviews.text: My boy loves this! It's so soft, cute, and a good size! I washed it as soon as I received it and put in dryer on medium heat, no problems! I recommend for anyone who has a fur baby and wants a soft cuddle blankie
customer_reviews.author: JenR

customer_reviews.title: Senior Dog loves her Blankie
customer_reviews.text: My Mia is a 15 y.o gal with mild dementia and 'Sundowning' syndrome. She also has occasional loss of bladder/bowel control. Not only does she love her blanket but I have already washed it a dozen times over the past month and it still looks like new. I was skeptical at first when it arrived because it was so soft and comfie. (wish they made human sizes for my bed :-)) However, it has far surpassed my expectations. Will let you know when it 'gives out'
customer_reviews.author: artemis1415

customer_reviews.title: Gets the paw of approval!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to put inside of a doggy car seat that I bought for our Chiweenie for an eight and a half hour drive home after getting a new car. The polka dot colors are cute as is the light warm tan color of the majority of the blanket. The black outer edge also lends to the overall aesthetic of the blanket. It is a bit in the small side and is not very thick but it serves my purpose perfectly! Our little guy cozied up on the whole way home with no complaints so!
customer_reviews.author: mightyjt

customer_reviews.title: PAWZ Road Pet Dog Blanket Fleece Blue
customer_reviews.text: My Shih Tzu puppy loves it, anyway! It is large enough for him to cuddle up to at night and is nice and thick. The quality is very good, and my pup has not torn it up or frayed it yet even thought he is a rough little puppy. He's about 12 pounds now and is very rambunctious. I purchased the blue and like the blanket very much. When we do start having cold weather which isn't often, he will be able to cuddle up to his blanket more. Hopefully it will last him a long time. It's a very pretty blanket. I wouldn't mind having one for myself to curl up to!
customer_reviews.author: J. CarsonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it, I love it
customer_reviews.text: My cats love curling up on this blanket. I got a medium and a large, the large I use to protect the couch when they chill out with me while watching TV. The Medium they sleep on. Nice and soft, good quality, easy to clean. I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Betti726

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves
customer_reviews.text: So far, my dog loves it. We’re trying to phase out an old, gross blanket. She’s allowing this new blanket on her bed, she hasn’t had to spend 5 minutes getting it “ready” for her to sit on (major plus) and she hasn’t ripped a hole in it yet. It’s a win!
customer_reviews.author: Windsorgrace

customer_reviews.title: To thin within 5 minutes or less was ripped from ...
customer_reviews.text: To thin within 5 minutes or less was ripped from my dogs nail or tooth. Very thin.....Returning it. Never opened the second one......
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S

customer_reviews.title: Zzzzzz...
customer_reviews.text: "What do you think of your new blanket, Cash?" "Let me just try it... Zzzzzz"
customer_reviews.author: P. Couling

customer_reviews.title: Our Puppy's Favorite Thing
customer_reviews.text: We bought this blanket in pink, size medium right before bringing home a brand new puppy - she is now almost six months old and this is still her favorite possession. She sleeps with it every night and carries it around throughout the day. At the beginning of her teething phase she did tear off a section of the black edging and occasionally chews on that spot, so I bought a replacement in case she really tears it apart (luckily it's a great price). Overall it holds up pretty nicely though and washes well.
customer_reviews.author: tk3xh

customer_reviews.title: Really soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought a few of these for my dogs in different sizes and colors. I really like them and so does the doges. What I would again is to order them in the large size, because you can then fold them for extra fluffiness. Your dog will love you for it!!!
customer_reviews.author: 3DogNite

customer_reviews.title: Dog Blankets.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my mid-size and mini daschaund who insist on laying on the couch. Also, my husband likes to eat while watching television. Sometimes crumbs slip off his tray and the two medium sizes blankets cover a full-size couch. They are very soft and comfy, great for catching crumbs. Will order another two for when these are washed.
customer_reviews.author: Jodyblonde

customer_reviews.title: Snuggly!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these blankets for my dogs crate as it is getting a little chilly at night...she loves them, they are very soft, easy to wash and they did not shrink in the dryer, I am going to purchase 3 more for gifts :)
customer_reviews.author: Leela

customer_reviews.title: Lucy Loves It!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blanket and so does my dog Lucy. I put it on her and its been her favorite blanket since day one. Its very soft, easy to keep clean, does not shrink or shed. I was worried at first because Lucy has allergies but she has been just fine because this blanket does not leave fuzz everywhere. Great blanket good price.
customer_reviews.author: Anna A

customer_reviews.title: Warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: With the colder weather settling in I wanted to get a blanket for my arthritic dog to lay on since he likes to hang out in the kitchen most of the day and the tile can be a little cool. It is so soft and feels great. My other doggie kept trying to lay on it so I ended up getting one for her and keep it in her special spot as well. Love em.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Color a bit different than expected
customer_reviews.text: Color was a bit lighter than I expected. Not too far off, but mine is more like a very cream/light gray. I would have ordered the darker gray had I known. So if you are wanting more of a gray tone - go for that one. That being said, it is soft, it is cute, and a good deal. I'd buy it again - I'd just change my color choice.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Walsh

product_meta.title: PAWZ Road Pet Dog Blanket Fleece Fabric Soft and Cute 4 Colors 4 Sizes
feature_bullets: 100% Double-Sided Coral velvet Fabrics (ployester). Well Made Blanket by Ultra-Soft Plush Material
Not Easy Pilling Not Easy to Drop Hair Close Skin Perfect for the Couch or Inside Pet Carrier or Your Car & RV
Soft and Warm Keep Pet Hair Off Furniture Beds and Upholstery and It's Machine Washable
Cute and nice Ideal For Travel and Naptime
